sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {IonPage, IonContent, IonItem, IonHeader,
    IonToolbar, IonButtons, IonBackButton, IonTitle, IonText} from '@ionic/react'

import { SortItems } from '../components/frontend/sort-items'

import { readSettings } from '../components/backend/data'

const fileName = 'data/beans-settings.data'  //filename übergeben

const fileRead =  () => {
    let fields = []
    let fileContent = readSettings(fileName)
    console.log('filecontent:', fileContent)
    if (fileContent) {   //if filename doesn't exist readSettings will return false    
        fields = JSON.parse(fileContent)
        console.log('fields:', fields)
    } else {
        //below is the basic fields that are available upon installation
        fields = [
            ['Bohne', true],
            ['Röster', true],
            ['Kommentar', false]]
    }
    return fields   
}

fileRead()
console.log('ich war hier')

const fields = [
    ['Bohne', true],
    ['Röster', true],
    ['Kommentar', false]]

export const BeansSettings = () => {
    return (
        <IonPage>
            <IonHeader>
                <IonToolbar>
                <IonTitle>Einstellungen Bohnen</IonTitle>
                
                </IonToolbar>
                <IonItem>
                    <IonText>Hier kann festgelegt werden, welche Felder zum Anlegen von Bohnen zur Verfügung stehen und in welcher Reihenfolge sie angezeigt werden.</IonText>
                </IonItem>
                </IonHeader>
                <IonContent>
                    {SortItems(fileName, fields)}
                </IonContent>
        </IonPage>
    )
}
